verse.lines: {lang-eng}’Twas wondrous love which led Him For us to suffer loss- To bear without a murmur The anguish of the cross; With saints redeemed in glory, Let us our voices raise, Till Heav’n and earth re-echo With our Redeemer’s praise.{/lang-eng}
